main event: On December 3, 1959, an observer at Greenville AFB, Mississippi, reported seeing an unidentified flying object that was described as traveling faster than an aircraft.
interesting points: The object was observed to move in a manner like a tail,The possibility of it being a daylight meteor was mentioned but ruled out due to the lengthy duration of the observation,The observer was located approximately 5 miles south-southwest of Greenville AFB,There were no other reported aircraft in the vicinity during the sighting,The reliability of the observer was confirmed as they do not consume alcohol or wear glasses.
witness description: Johnny E Reddick, TSGT, AF, a reliable military instructor
